= How to install ircsearch =

1)Extract .zip/.tar.gz/.tar.bz archive using your favorite tool .
2)Install  Net_SmartIRC Pear package .
  You can easily install it using "  pear install Net_SmartIRC "
3)Edit config.php
4)Run main.php
5)Enjoy !
